Uses of Class
core_classes.Layer

  • Packages that use Layer 
    Package Description
    application_frames
    Contains the frames used to make up the interface of the entire application, including the main application frame, the Settings window, the Attribute Table window and other associated GUI frames.
    core_components
    Contains the core components of the application.
    database
    Contains the definition of a PostgreSQL database connection class, which is used to read and write layers to a database representation.
    file_handling
    Contains the Classes used for the File Handling (Import / Export CSV) and the management of the database credentials in an external file
    models
    Contains definitions of the table model objects used to control the tabular data structures in the application.

    • Uses of Layer in application_frames

      Methods in application_frames that return Layer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Layer MainFrame.createLayerFromResultSet(java.sql.ResultSet resultSet, java.lang.String layerName)
      Creates a new layer from a database result set
      Methods in application_frames with parameters of type Layer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void MainFrame.createFeatureFromResultSet(Layer newLayer, java.lang.String layerType, boolean isEllipse, java.lang.Double[] aX, java.lang.Double[] aY, double rx, double ry)
      Creates a feature from a result set
      static void MainFrame.renameLayerInDatabase(java.lang.String oldName, Layer layer)
      Renames a layer in the database by dropping the old layer's table and writing a new one.
      The layer combo list is also updated.
      static boolean MainFrame.saveLayerToDB(Layer layer)
      Saves a layer to the database
      Checks for existing layers from the database
      Prompts to overwrite the layer if the same name was found
      After saving, the layer notSavedState will be turned to false.
      Constructors in application_frames with parameters of type Layer 
      Constructor and Description
      AttributeTableFrame(Layer layer)
      Creates the Attribute Table Frame
